note: I've been an International Celebrity Life Coach to the Stars for as long as I can remember (though I have got a terrible memory so it may not be as long as I think it is!) My celebrity clients have always paid through the nose for my advice (those that have any noses left that is!) My reputation amongst the glitterati has spread like dysentery, and I've been credited with bring about 12 marriages, 17 divorces & a couple of trips to Dignitas. I now offer my valuable advice for free via YouTube!
